ActSpecial Retirement Arrangements Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Retirement Compensation Arrangements Regulations, No. 1
PrecisRegulations Amending the RETIREMENT COMPENSATION ARRANGEMENTS REGULATIONS, NO. 1 in order to ensure that the Regulations are aligned with the 2012 amendments made to the Public Service Superannuation Act, and consequential amendments to the Public Service Superannuation Regulations.
